lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info:
I am a pure water advocate. Did you know that approximately 70% of the human body is made up of water? It should be obvious then that the kind of water we are drinking is extremely important. For our body to be at optimal health, we need to be consuming the most beneficial water possible. Now that you know just how important water is to the body, you can begin to understand how crucial it is to be drinking the right kind of water.
I am marketing a water ionizer that restores your body's proper pH balance. It's pure and acts as a powerful anti-oxidant. In addition, this water detoxifies and super-hydrates your body.
Not only drinking water from this home based machine is good for you body, it is also great for our environment. "Going green" is getting a lot of attention these days as it's becoming more and more apparent that the Earth is in peril. The need to reduce waste and to recycle is obvious, and using a Water System provides you with an extremely easy way to live more eco-friendly. Not only are many people surprised by how much waste they are producing, they are also amazed by the toll it is taking on their pocketbook. For example, does your family use those 5-gallon water bottles? If so, you're most likely spending close to $600 a year on them. Now add in the cost of all other beverages and your many different household cleaners, and the total can easily be well over $1,200! Imagine how much money you would save if you could just purchase one item - just one time - that would then be able to provide you with healthy drinking water, as well as, safe, all-natural cleansers...
Alkaline Ionized Water Systems allow you to choose the pH level of the water it creates. Depending on the acid/alkaline setting you have chosen, you can produce water that can be used for anything from drinking to gently cleansing you face, body, and hair. In addition, you can produce water that is perfect for safely sanitizing multiple surfaces around your home. By purchasing a Alkaline Ionized Water System you can rid yourself of the need to buy those commercial, chemical-filled cleaners. You can also stop buying bottled water, because now you have a healthier choice - alkalized and ionized water!

lender.name: Anthony
lender.occupational_info: Due to the economy downturn, many people with dissabilites, elderly people and individuals with limited income are seriously impacted. The individuals listed above and many more out there are not able to get around even to a grocery store or to pick up medication due to high cost. I have over 5 years experience transporting individuals for non-emergent medical transportation. I just started my own licensed company called Remediks medical transportation. I would like to do more volunteer work for these individuals and expand my business. My target is to raise $12,000.00 to add one economical wheelchair equiped van for the job and use some part of the fund for supply needed. I receive too many phone calls asking me to help but I am also limited but with this fund, some of the clients will have a smile. If you can make someone smile atleast once a day, you have giving that individual life and that is what I do.

lender.name: christopher styles
lender.loan_because: Hi i am a 30 year old professional Barber living in the great northwest. My passion in life since i was 12 yo is cutting and styling men and boys hair. I learned at a early age the power of looking good and feeling good about urself. Something as small as a 15 minute haircut can boost one's self confidence to achieve their goals or motivate that person to start working towards them. That is exactly how i felt the day i got my first professional haircut in a barbershop. Alot of my peers and especially the kids need more places to go to afterschool, on the weekend, or just to get away from their neighborhoods that will motivate and teach them the importance and the right path to becoming a productive and respected member of their community, city, and country. Since i have been out of work i have been stopping by community centers and senior centers giving discounted haircuts. My clientel is picking up and driving across town 2 or 3 times a day is starting to take a toll on my vehicle (gas), and as well as my energy. I have found a building that is perfect for my business. Its right across from an elemetry school and up the street from a senior center i have volunteered at. I feel having this building would allow me the room and security i need to continue barbering. I'm praying to raise the cost of the down payment wich is $3000. I have the clientel to keep up with the mortgage so that wouldnt be a problem. I have had a few stars on my rosterin the past when they lived in Seattle like, nfl players like: shawn alexander, seneca wallace and dyral jackson, nba players like shawn kemp, avery johnson, nate mcmillian, rashard lewis and a couple a music artist like warren g. as well as ray j. So if u can help a young entrepunuer from seattle get my business of the grown it would be greatly appreciated (and paid back fully)!!!!! Thanx so much for taking the time out to hear my story. GOD bless!
lender.occupational_info: My work speaks for itself. I am passionate about cutting hair like kobe bryant is passionate about winning another title. I think my work is very detailed and neat.

lender.loan_because: I am positioning the company to support federal and state contracts and small-mid sized companies. I invision in the next three years three core staff members will be added. I need to reach companies that have the budget to support the services we offer. Although I have taken a grass roots approach to networking and increasing awareness about my services, I really need a targeted marketing / branding campaign to reach companies . The goal is to build a core group of clients throughout the mid-atlantic area and eventually support companies across the U.S. Capital will allow me to have a stronger marketing campaign, pay for memberships for BNI (Business Network International) , Rotary Club, Chamber Memberships, participate in FIOS 2010 and other local conferences, in addition to developing marketing material needed to interface with contracting officers with decision making power to award contracts for my services.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because:
I believe that dollars are my vote in this economy.:
I vote for others' financial independence... I vote for gender equality in opportunity... I vote for supporting those brave enough to ask for help... I vote for economic prosperity as emigration prevention...
I vote for making a difference $25 at a time! I believe our collective voice is as strong as any millionaire's!
lender.occupational_info: In concrete terms: I design roads. In more abstract terms: I improve mobility and safety for commuters, schoolchildren, cyclists, horseback riders, vacationers, handicapped members of our community, and even those just out walking the dog.

lender.name: Manish
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to see that no loan is small to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Employed at American Express

lender.name: Ace
lender.occupational_info: entertainment

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I would like to purchase or have an HD Format Camcorder kit donated to me. Many kits can be found at bhphotovideo.com. The current equipment I have is outdated and I am unable to provide HD quality productions. I would also like to purchase an entry-level professional camera to start a photo site, similar to the video site I currently operate. I plan on making major modern day improvements to my website, showtimeweb.com.
lender.occupational_info:
I have been recording marching band events for various organizations since 2003. I basically serve as a videographer / photographer for the marching bands. I am sent an invitation and I go and record the event. I then post the entire event to the internet in the form of video clips and photo galleries. That way the bands can use them for various exposure needs. If the director request a DVD, I will also create one for them.
I have never charged for my work. I love marching bands and I do this for the love of music. And I know first hand that many bands cannot afford a videographer to do what I do for them. I do everything from recording, editiing to publishing and have even created 3 web sites for bands.
My website is sort of a "YouTube.com" for marching band fans. I have been at this for almost 7 years and I love what I do. The website, hosting, domain, cost traveling events, are all covered by me.
I would really like to have HD equipment to keep up with the times. So i am asking for your help to obtain it.
Anymore questions feel free to email me, chris@showtimeweb.com
Thanks, Chris

lender.name: AJ's
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently working on starting a not for profit organization called AJ's Haven. A & J are the initials of the first name of my children and this foundation is a promise that I will not put them in another domestic violence situation again. In addition, the promise goes on to state that I will go to help others get out of domestic violence by starting not for profit organization called AJ's Haven. It's a three step organization to help domestic violence survivors with indivdual, family and group therapies to get them out of the violence and to stay out. The second goes to assist them with finding them lot term affordable safe housing and the third, aftrer one year of couseling getting them some assistance with legal services to help wth divorce, custody and child support issues that go hand in hand with the abuse through the judicial system.
What many indviduals don't realize is that domestic violence happens even when orders of protections are issued in order to protect the families form teh physical, mental and emotional abuse.

lender.name: Rick

lender.name: BOB
lender.loan_because: I was a Mortgage Broker & Real Estate Broker and was running my own office when everything came crashing down around me, Itried to hold on but was busted by incresing debt!
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional with an inspiration for integrity. I am well mannered and treat everyone I meet as special and new in my life.
